text: Campomanesia reitziana is a species of plant in the family Myrtaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== reitz Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Atlantic Forest (biome) Category:Flora of São Paulo (state) Category:Flora of Santa Catarina (state) Category:Near threatened flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Campomanesia reitziana
